name: Neon Ghost
description:
At the moment of an unfortunate demise, you find yourself in a strange, unearthly construction, floating in an endless void.  A disembodied voice tells you that your timeline has been artifically extended for the purposes of rescuing this V.O.I.D, Memeory Storage Capsule (roughly translated from the Archelon language), which is currently infested with strange Digi-mites, parasitic viruses bent on devouring the memories that YOU are now tasked with saving.

Run, blast, and devastate your enemies in a title lovingly inspired by such classics as Quake, Doom, or Wolfenstein.  Development is currently in full force, with additional levels, power-ups, and even super powers being worked on for YOUR gaming pleasure!
